abstract.para: The infrastructure and services that will be used by the in-house and contributing developers during the development of Uludag is referred to as the developer systems. This is not among the value-adding components of Uludag, still is essential for improving quality and efficiency.

sect1.para:
Within the scope of Uludag Developer System Project:
The components of the developer system (web site, project management/monitoring, version control, bug tracking, build farm, package repository, etc.) and user (=developer) requirements for these will be determined, The alternatives for all these systems will be surveyed, compared and the ones to be used will be decided upon and designed, The hardware and software requirements for all these systems will be determined and acquired, they will be deployed, All these systems and services will be installed and operated, The external and internal web sites for Uludag will be designed, formed and operated, The documentation system will be designed, formed and operated, The manuals addressing the developers for all these systems will be prepared and published.
Project contact: A. Murat Eren, meren@uludag.org.tr
